from common_area order by area_id asc

mapper.update:
update common_area
area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_type = #{areaType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_shortname = #{areaShortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_longname = #{areaLongname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_order = #{areaOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
long_pinyin = #{longPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
short_pinyin = #{shortPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update common_area set area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, area_type = #{areaType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_shortname = #{areaShortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_longname = #{areaLongname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_order = #{areaOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, long_pinyin = #{longPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, short_pinyin = #{shortPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
